attributes.action: support and think about the hardworking people in this country, the senior citizens who have worked and served our country and our future generations who want to educate themselves to work in our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The more I talk to people the more I am becoming aware that this government is creating racial discrimination by giving to other cultures who enter this country whether legally or illegally.
Why does the government not support our workers, hospitals, education, communities, senior citizens instead of giving finance to those who arrive in Britain by way of housing, benefits, food vouchers and transport.
I feel government should get down in the real world and live amongst us for a while then maybe they would really see what is going on and where our taxpayers money is really going to.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
